casebody.data:
No. 10-10034. Fred E. Christian, Petitioner v. Frank Bommarito Oldsmobile, Inc., dba Bommarito Infinity. 564 U.S. 1024, 131 S. Ct. 3031,

180 L. Ed. 2d 854,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4593. June 20, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 403 Fed. Appx. 133.
